Module.Name: Effect representations
Module.Description: Effect representations specify the responses that can be used to measure specified effects and which response levels, the benchmark response (BMR), define the hazard limits for the effects.
Module.ShortDescription: Effect representations specify the responses can be used to measure specified effects and which response levels, the benchmark response (BMR), define the hazard limits for the effects.
Module.DataDescription: Effect representations are provided as data in the form of specified combinations of effect and response, optionally with a benchmark response that defines a hazard limit for the effect.
